content:
Hi All,
I want to create a main page/e.g: EKG and include all the child profiles in there of Implementation Guide.If anybody knows about that then ping me.
You can start by looking at the I publisher documentation And take a look at some examples of published IG's

Keep in mind that "pages" and "profiles" are different things. You can have as many pages as you like and pages can have hyperlinks to whatever profiles you wish - that's totally a question of how you want to organize content.

@Lloyd McKenzie
I want to organize the content then how can I do.
can you provide some example links where it is follow.

Most of the HL7 implementation guides are on github. Some of them use different approaches, but all will give you a sense of how to organize your content. A relatively simple one is here: https://github.com/HL7/sdc

Hi All,
when I organizing the content in the Implementation Guide then I unable to load the spreadsheet,loading time exception is showing like:
unable to load spreadsheet:null
if anybody knows about that ping me. I also send the screenshotUntitled.png
